column4: Are there any guides for ubuntu on how to host a website on your own internal network?
for starters: run sudo apt-get install apache2 and then point your browser to your local ip adress - the web pages live in /var/www by default
I was told I should use lamp? is that the same thing?
lamp or xamp is a package that runs the whole shebang from one directory including mysql and php. downside: no security updates
